Projects.title: OTP verification simulator using Jetpack Compose
Projects.description: Simulates otp code verification by sending codes as notification to device (not on specified phone number), uses Jetpack Compose and Kotlin .

Projects.title: Collapsing Toolbar with hint changing Searchbar
Projects.description: This mini Android project implements the basic Collapsing Toolbar and hint changing searchbar using MotionLayout & is made Using #JetpackCompose

Projects.title: Analog Clock using Jetpack Compose with Canvas
Projects.description: This is a very simple Analog clock made using Canvas and Android Jetpack Compose

Projects.title: Sassy , Lipstick tryout app
Projects.description: Basic Lipstick tryout app that plays with image blend modes to apply different colours or lipstick on Model's face

Projects.title: Cupcake Shop App
Projects.description: An basic shopping uses Navigation and RecyclerView with Viewmodel and restores data when phone's state changes like rotation

Projects.title: Calculator App without using calculation library
Projects.description: It is a kotlin made modern ui simple calculator , well i made this without using any external library , i used to manipulate strings and calculate the result .
